title.rendered: Stunning Basement Ground & First Floor For Sale In Vasant Vihar

content.rendered:
Stunning-looking apartments with swanky Interiors boast this super Modern High-End luxurious basement ground and first floor set on a sprawling 400sq yds occupying a peaceful wide street. The ground-floor Triplex comes with a separate Lift, an Exclusive Driveway, a fully loaded kitchen with functional appliances, a beautifully decorated welcoming living and dining room, and a guest powder room. The basement will have huge Spaces for your entertainment and parties with a feature wall, a sunken Courtyard, a Green Wall, a waterfall, Bar, Pantry, etc. you will find four dreamy bedrooms with attached bathrooms and closets. The master bedroom ensuite bathroom and adjoining balcony encourage relaxation.

Vasant Vihar is an established posh residential colony with each block having its own market and park. Many Diplomats and Expats have chosen Vasant vihar as their preferred location for residence. The Indira Gandhi International Airport is just 10km away from this location.

♕4BHK
♕400 Sqyds
♕For Sale
♕Modern Facade
♕Stilt Parking
♕Grandeur Interiors
♕Posh Location
♕Secured Neighbourhood


📞 Call On 9818312077 For Site Visit or More Information On This Luxury Property
Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
Checkout Our Other Listings
